Description: Freshly steamed milk with vanilla-flavored syrup is marked with espresso and topped with caramel drizzle for an oh-so-sweet finish.
Starbucks signature espresso and milk are highlighted by flavor notes of pumpkin, cinnamon, nutmeg and clove to create this incredible beverage that's a fall favorite.
A combination of rich, full-bodied espresso with bittersweet mocha sauce and steamed milk, then topped off with sweetened whipped cream.
Freshly steamed milk and cinnamon dolce flavored syrup added to classic espresso, then topped off with sweetened whipped cream and cinnamon dolce topping.
Dark, rich espresso lies in wait under a smoothed and stretched layer of thick foam. It's truly the height of a baristas' craft.
Mocha sauce and toffee nut syrup are combined with coffee and milk, then topped with sweetened whipped cream, caramel drizzle and a blend of turbinado sugar and sea salt.
Black tea infused with cinnamon, clove, and other warming spices is combined with steamed milk and topped with foam for the perfect balance of sweet and spicy.
Smooth and creamy matcha is lightly sweetened and served with steamed milk. A perfect zen.
Strawberries and milk are blended with ice and topped with a swirl of whipped cream.
Buttery caramel syrup meets coffee, milk and ice for a rendezvous in the blender. Then whipped cream and caramel sauce layer the love on top.
Coffee with cinnamon dolce flavored syrup, blended with milk and ice. Topped with sweetened whipped cream and our cinnamon dolce topping.
Mocha sauce is blended with Frappuccino chips, coffee, milk and ice then top with whipped cream and mocha drizzle for endless java joy.
A sweet and sour mix that brings lemonade and vanilla together. Finished perfectly with whipped cream and a caramel sugar sprinkle.
Real fruit juice, mint and a lime slice shaken with Green Coffee Extract for a boost of natural energy, served over ice.
Small-batch cold brew slow-steeped for a super smooth taste has a naturally sweet flavor and cascading, velvety crema.
Coffee meets milk and ice in a blender to create one of the original Frappuccino beverages.
